text: Libretto title page, 1823 Didone abbandonata is an 1823 opera in two acts by Saverio Mercadante to a libretto by Andrea Leone Tottola after Metastasio's Didone abbandonata.Karyl Charna Lynn, Italian Opera Houses and Festivals It was first performed on 18 January 1823 at the Teatro Regio in Turin. {| class="wikitable" !
